text:
Yeah, you're really pumped up,
Haruki.

Look at this notebook...! I've written down everything
we're going to do and our tasks for this camp!

Hmm... impressive...
But isn't it a bit too packed...?

So, I thought I should
discuss it with you first, Producer-san...!

I want to improve my physical strength more
and I want to train my voice more...

I want to do a lot of dance practice too,
but time is limited...

Yeah, that's true...
It's good to have a clear view of the tasks, but...

This camp isn't just about completing tasks,
it's also a place to find new challenges, don't you think?

Let's also think about specific points to improve,
what to tackle first...

Indeed... rushing forward recklessly
might not yield much...

Thank you, Producer-san.
I'd be happy if we could find them together!
